description:
A religious organization modelled mainly after the roman catholc church that is part of the Highschool DxD universe.
Main setting invoves a war between heaven, fallen angels and devils that was fought way back in the past in which god (known from the bible) as well the leader of the devils were killed. Since that time the archangel Michael took over in heaven and four devil kings reign over the nether world.
name: Kyoukai
